storyInfo: Thorns is invited back to Iberia to help rebuild a town. He works with a local youth to plan a celebration for a forgotten festival.

attributes.content: Welcome!
attributes.name: Friendly Woman

attributes.content: Oh, you're...
attributes.name: Friendly Woman

attributes.content: One set meal to go, please.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Here's the money.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Okay, exact change... No, wait a second!
attributes.name: Friendly Woman

attributes.content: What are you doing here? And your clothes... Did another experiment go wrong?
attributes.name: Friendly Woman

attributes.content: No, it went well.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Just a bit of an accident at the end. No problem at all.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: You call that 'no problem'... I'll never understand you outsiders.
attributes.name: Friendly Woman

attributes.content: Also, didn't I say I'd deliver meals for you and Felipe? If you just come here like this...
attributes.name: Friendly Woman

attributes.content: The eyes in the small tavern converge upon the two, most of them not exactly friendly.
All around, conversations cut themselves off as the other customers take in the presence of the unfamiliar Ægir face.
The silence is soon replaced by excited whispers.
Is that the one? The outsider here for some sort of 'cooperation.'
attributes.name: Curious Customer

attributes.content: Looks like a normal guy to me.
attributes.name: Curious Customer

attributes.content: Shh, he's Ægir.
attributes.name: Cautious Customer

attributes.content: Didn't the Inquisition agree to allow their return?
attributes.name: Curious Customer

attributes.content: You can't trust everything you hear.
attributes.name: Cautious Customer

attributes.content: I don't want to get dragged into it if he gets arrested or something.
attributes.name: Cautious Customer

attributes.content: Things may have gotten better in recent years, but don't tell me you forgot how it was a decade ago, when the Inquisition was dragging people off on the regular.
attributes.name: Cautious Customer

attributes.content: Of course I haven't. I was young then, but I remember being interrogated for a long time. I was almost taken away.
attributes.name: Curious Customer

attributes.content: You're right, better safe than sorry. He's Ægir, after all...
attributes.name: Curious Customer

attributes.content: Noisy.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: The Ægir casually picks up the cup from the table.
Then he lets it slip from his fingers, and it shatters on the ground with a bang.
The tavern instantly quiets down.
He didn't hear us, did he?
attributes.name: Curious Customer

attributes.content: Shh, who knows? Best keep our mouths shut.
attributes.name: Cautious Customer

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Friendly Woman

attributes.content: I'll pay for the cup.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: ...That's not what I'm concerned about.
attributes.name: Friendly Woman

attributes.content: Yeah, don't worry about it.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: I should be saying that... er, don't worry about it.
attributes.name: Friendly Woman

attributes.content: They're not bad people. It's just that...
attributes.name: Friendly Woman

attributes.content: Not a problem. Just a matter of getting used to it.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: But isn't it hard to take?
attributes.name: Friendly Woman

attributes.content: I heard from the mayor that you and your friends are here to help us.
attributes.name: Friendly Woman

attributes.content: We're the ones asking for help, yet we're treating you like this...
attributes.name: Friendly Woman

attributes.content: Huh? You misunderstand me.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: I don't care what other people think of me. What I meant was that the rest of you Iberians have to get used to it.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Friendly Woman

attributes.content: The Inquisition has made its choice.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: A window has opened. Ægirs who were once forced to leave are now returning. There will only be more of us in the future.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: If you've decided to accept our help, then you need to get used to seeing us on the streets.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: ...Is that why you go out for a walk in town every day?
attributes.name: Friendly Woman

attributes.content: I'm not just walking, I'm measuring. I need to know how wide the roads are.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: I was surprised to find that time seems to have stopped for decades here. Many things need to be fixed or replaced.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: It's the same thing... walking on the streets like you own the place. All the customers have been talking about you.
attributes.name: Friendly Woman

attributes.content: Doesn't matter to me.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Ha... alright, as long as you're okay with it.
attributes.name: Friendly Woman

attributes.content: So how are preparations going with you and Felipe?
attributes.name: Friendly Woman

attributes.content: Are you planning a surprise? Felipe said it was a celebration... but I don't remember any festive dates this time of year.
attributes.name: Friendly Woman

attributes.content: I'm just helping out. Felipe has a good idea; we just need to hammer out the details.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: You'll know more soon enough.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: You're not about to do anything crazy, are you?
attributes.name: Friendly Woman

attributes.content: I heard there were festivals that last for days, with flowers and cheering crowds everyday, and fireworks in broad daylight... I can't even imagine.
attributes.name: Friendly Woman

attributes.content: We haven't had anything like that for a long time.
attributes.name: Friendly Woman

attributes.content: It's not too late.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Felipe wants everyone to be able to participate, like in the Iberia of yore.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Is he still reading those books? The Adventures of Captain Alfonso, The Pirate King and the Golden Kingdom... he hasn't outgrown them?
attributes.name: Friendly Woman

attributes.content: Nothing wrong with that.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Iberia in its Golden Age may have been arrogant, but at least there was something to be proud of, compared to the shambled state it's in today.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Felipe has a knack for working with machines. He really should go out into the world and broaden his horizons, if the opportunity presents itself.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Go out and see the world...
attributes.name: Friendly Woman

attributes.content: That would be really nice.
attributes.name: Friendly Woman

attributes.content: Here's your set meal.
attributes.name: Friendly Woman

attributes.content: And this one's for Felipe.
attributes.name: Friendly Woman

attributes.content: How much?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Don't worry about it.
attributes.name: Friendly Woman

attributes.content: Treat it as a token of appreciation on behalf of the others. To tell the truth, I'm kind of looking forward to the surprise you and Felipe are planning.
attributes.name: Friendly Woman

attributes.content: I hope it'll be like in the books.
attributes.name: Friendly Woman

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Okay? What do you mean—
attributes.name: Friendly Woman

attributes.content: He's gone.
attributes.name: Friendly Woman

attributes.content: Weird guy...
attributes.name: Friendly Woman

attributes.content: Hold it, Felipe.
attributes.name: Tense Townsfolk

attributes.content: Didn't you hear us?
attributes.name: Tense Townsfolk

attributes.content: ...Did you need something?
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: I'm in a hurry. If you don't have anything important—
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: Where do you think you're going?
attributes.name: Tense Townsfolk

attributes.content: You're not fiddling around with that Ægir again, are you?
attributes.name: Tense Townsfolk

attributes.content: That's none of your business.
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: Besides, Mr. Thorns is here by invitation. You should show some respect.
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: Respect is one thing, keeping your distance is another.
attributes.name: Tense Townsfolk

attributes.content: Besides, he won't even tell you his real name, just a code name. Who's to say he didn't used to be a bandit or something?
attributes.name: Tense Townsfolk

attributes.content: Mr. Thorns said he's an employee of Rhodes Island!
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: He's an Iberian expatriate, forced to leave after certain events...
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: Rhodes what? Never heard of it.
attributes.name: Tense Townsfolk

attributes.content: And what events, exactly? How do we know for sure he's not the same as those crazy Ægir?
attributes.name: Tense Townsfolk

attributes.content: Maybe he's one that the Inquisition is after, just good at hiding things—
attributes.name: Tense Townsfolk

attributes.content: Shut up!
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: Er—
attributes.name: Tense Townsfolk

attributes.content: This is all baseless accusation, pure speculation!
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: Don't any of you remember that tomorrow is—
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: Tomorrow is what?
attributes.name: Tense Townsfolk

attributes.content: ...You'll find out tomorrow.
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: I trust the Inquisition's judgment. And I know that Mr. Thorns isn't like that.
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: ...Alright, Felipe, I guess I went too far. That Ægir—the one who calls himself Thorns—may be useful.
attributes.name: Tense Townsfolk

attributes.content: As for tomorrow, I'm not sure what you're planning... but we'll be waiting.
attributes.name: Tense Townsfolk

attributes.content: Just remember that we're really worried about you. You should open your eyes and stay away from the Ægir!
attributes.name: Tense Townsfolk

attributes.content: Was that my fault?
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: People like you may be a minority among the Iberians.
Mr. Thorns?!
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: When did you...?
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: From 'fiddling around with that Ægir again.'
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Here, this is from Martín's Tavern.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Ah, thank you...
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: Wait a second! I'm so sorry about just now.
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: They aren't bad people. Please don't take it personally.
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: They're just concerned... We don't see a lot of outsiders here.
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: What's the matter?
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: My head hurts.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: I don't like being apologized to over and over again.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: S-Sorry!
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: The Ægir who has returned to his homeland in a manner he never expected sighs.
The past is buried deep in his heart. He can overlook a lot of things, but there is something different about this place and the people who live here.
That is why he stands here now, as an Ægir.
Because he has the ability to do so. Following his heart, he came back to the place that he never thought he would come back to.
There's nothing to apologize for.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: Have you finished calibrating the... what was it, 'Automatic Perpetual Sugar Sprayer'?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: It fell quite a bit short of 'perpetual' in the last test.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Ah, yes! I was just about to tell you. I think I'm about to make some real progress in efficiency and endurance!
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: It's all thanks to that manuscript from Weedy you brought.
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: Thank her yourself if you have the chance.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: I will!
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: Along with the concoction that you prepared, everyone will be so surprised tomorrow!
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: Mm.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Oh, by the way, I want to make some improvements to what I brewed up.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: ...Have you ever seen the 'Midday Flame'?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: M-Mr. Thorns!
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: *cough*, *cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: A-Are you okay?
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: I'm fine.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Just got the ratios wrong.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Things don't look fine to me...
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: Look, your hair got burnt!
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: Hm? Oh...
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Just shave it off.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: What are you doing with the knife? Wait! Don't cut it like that—!
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: For heaven's sake, at least let me do it for you!
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: Alright then.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Er, haha, it's nothing...
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: Alright, that should do it.
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: You should keep your distance, to be safe.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Are your experiments always so dangerous?
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: They invited you here, but then put you out in the middle of nowhere, without proper facilities...
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: It's fine, this is a good place.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: I have all the basics here. Anything more complex probably needs an application anyway.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Application?
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: To the Inquisition.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Years ago, they arrested a lot of people, confiscating everything that the Islanders brought. Technology that has been lost to modern-day Iberia may still be found within the Inquisition.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: And now it's time to put it to use.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: There are no Ægir left in this town.
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: There used to be some, years ago. I heard that when my parents were young, everyone was treated the same way, whether they were Liberi or Ægir.
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: Until the Penal Battalion arrived.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: ...Yes, until they arrived.
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: Many people were taken, mostly Ægir, but also people of other races who were close to them.
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: The rest of the Ægir left one by one. People say they left of their own accord, but...
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: But you don't agree.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: I... I don't know. I wasn't there.
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: You seem to know a lot about these things.
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: Thorns knew a lot about these things.
The fate of the Ægir in this country was sealed the moment Iberia realized the threat from the ocean, when the Inquisition began using force to deal with its tentacles stretching out from the sea.
They had breathing room in some places; in others, they were not so lucky.
This town happened to be one of the 'others.'
The fear of suppression has always hung over Iberia. Whether they left of their own accord or were forced to leave doesn't matter in the end.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: A worse fate awaited those who stayed than those who went into the barrenlands, or returned to the ocean.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: ...Did you leave because of that too?
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: So... why did you come back now?
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: Even I can see that life out there is good.
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: A strange question.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Do I need a reason?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: ...What?
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: Have you decided where you want to go?
attributes.name: Amiable Priest

attributes.content: Anywhere.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Maybe outside, away from this country.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Your eyes are calm, my child.
attributes.name: Amiable Priest

attributes.content: You're the only one who didn't try to persuade me to leave together.
attributes.name: Amiable Priest

attributes.content: You won't leave.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: ...You're not innocent.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Ha, perhaps.
attributes.name: Amiable Priest

attributes.content: Go, child. Your will has always been strong. Follow it.
attributes.name: Amiable Priest

attributes.content: Never stop thinking. We have the right to follow our thoughts, no matter where they lead us.
attributes.name: Amiable Priest

attributes.content: I'll remember that.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Farewell, teacher.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Don't overthink it.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Iberia provided an opportunity, and the other Ægir and I accepted its offer. There was something in it for both of us.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: I see.
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: ...I knew a fool who believed that Iberia would change.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: But I don't care how it changes; I just want to do what I want to do.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: You always seem so calm.
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: The Ægir who left, the ones who should have been our brethren...
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: Will they come back someday?
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: Maybe, if you wish it.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Aren't you doing all this in preparation for that day?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: What are you doing, Felipe?!
attributes.name: Mayor

attributes.content: Why have you blocked the roads? What's with these strange machines?
attributes.name: Mayor

attributes.content: Stop this absurdity at once and go home!
attributes.name: Mayor

attributes.content: Of course I know what day it is, Uncle Pablo.
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: Once, friends from a faraway land took our hands, and together we built the Golden Age.
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: And this was the day that our hands first came together.
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: What are you babbling about...?
attributes.name: Mayor

attributes.content: Am I really babbling, Uncle Pablo?
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: T-That was ages ago...
attributes.name: Mayor

attributes.content: People don't bring it up anymore. Many don't even dare to.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: But the Iberians should have remembered.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Today is a day to remember.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: A day to remember?
attributes.name: Skeptical Townsfolk

attributes.content: I've never heard of it...
attributes.name: Skeptical Townsfolk

attributes.content: You're too young to.
attributes.name: Old Townsfolk

attributes.content: We used to celebrate it when I was little. There were people frolicking in the square, day and night. We would call each other brothers.
attributes.name: Old Townsfolk

attributes.content: The Ægir built new things. Ships that traveled on dry land, automatic fireworks, lighthouses that changed color on their own...
attributes.name: Old Townsfolk

attributes.content: Then why have I never heard about any of this?
attributes.name: Skeptical Townsfolk

attributes.content: ...We stopped celebrating them.
attributes.name: Old Townsfolk

attributes.content: After... all those terrible things.
attributes.name: Old Townsfolk

attributes.content: So... they're telling the truth?
attributes.name: Skeptical Townsfolk

attributes.content: We used to celebrate this day?
attributes.name: Skeptical Townsfolk

attributes.content: Of course we did!
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: Let's do it, Mr. Thorns!
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: A Liberi and an Ægir stand side-by-side in the crowd.
Tears gather in the eyes of the older townsfolk at the sight of it. Memories have faded with time and wordless oppression. Have they seen a scene like this in the past?
All eyes are on the Ægir as he lights the fuse.
They were happier times, better times.
...Fireworks?
attributes.name: Friendly Woman

attributes.content: Fireworks in bright daylight...
attributes.name: Friendly Woman

attributes.content: The books were telling the truth...
attributes.name: Friendly Woman

attributes.content: Maybe they'll write about this, someday.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: You mean they'll write about me, just like they write about Captain Alfonso? Haha, I find that hard to believe.
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: Oh, Mr. Thorns, Mr. Thorns!
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: You've got powder from the fireworks on your face!
attributes.name: Felipe

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Consider it part of the celebration.
attributes.name: Thorns
